name: Oscuro Tamashi
description:
After years of trying to make a playable game

I Decided to make a  rpg game  and try to turn into  a souls like game

I haven't made it that far yet

But I finally made a playable game

Please check out these people as they help make this game Possible:

1. "https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFBMwcsf5FK7gyw44dlMQXw"

2. "https://www.youtube.com/user/VirtusEdu"

Hope you enjoy the "game"
